result.html: Gurb amhlaidh duitseSame to you!
result.ponchtml: Gurb aṁlaiḋ duitseSame to you!

result.eng: It is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.
result.ga: Is amhlaidh go ndearna an Taoiseach roinnt botún
result.orig: Is amhlaidh go ndearna an Taoiseach roinnt botún
result.html: Is amhlaidh go ndearna an Taoiseach roinnt botúnIt is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.
result.ponchtml: Is aṁlaiḋ go ndearna an Taoiseaċ roinnt botúnIt is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.

result.eng: The Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ga: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.orig: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.html: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ponchtml: Is iad na Polannaiġ an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin aṁlaiḋ toisc a ṁéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.

result.eng: If it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ga: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.orig: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.html: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ponchtml: Más aṁlaiḋ go ḃfuil na páirtiṫe sásta cuṁaċt a roinnt beiḋ coṁrialtas ann sul i ḃfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.

result.eng: You do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.
result.ga: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairt
result.orig: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairt
result.html: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairtYou do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.
result.ponchtml: Ní gá duit seolaḋ a ṫaḃairt aċ má ḋéanann tú aṁlaiḋ beiḋ muid in ann freagra pearsanta a ṫaḃairtYou do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.
